DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label study evaluating the safety and tolerability of topical ocular mecamylamine given twice a day in patients with diabetic macular edema (DME). Patients will be treated for 12 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Topical Ocular Mecamylamine in Diabetic Macular Edema (DME)
DOC.criteria: macular edema due to diabetic retinopathy vision loss from other ocular disease intraocular surgery within 3 months intraocular antiVEGF or steroids within 3 months HbA1c >12
